dublinCore.dc:title: 104 HR 7612 IH: Desalination Research Advancement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Levin of California (for himself and Ms. Mace) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To advance desalination research and technological innovation, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Desalination Research Advancement Act.

subsection.text: Section 8 of the Water Desalination Act of 1996 (42 U.S.C. 10301 note; Public Law 104–298) is amended in subsection (a)—

paragraph.text: by striking $5,000,000 per year for fiscal years 1997 through 2021 and inserting $20,000,000 per year for fiscal years 2022 through 2026; and

subsection.text: Section 3(e) of the Water Desalination Act of 1996 is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (6), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:
to minimize the impacts of seawater desalination on aquatic life and coastal ecosystems, including technologies to monitor and reduce those impacts.
